tag_list: online-media, seo, sem, sea, social-media, cpc, cost-per-clic, pay-per-click, ppc, jobboard
overview:
Job Brokers was founded by me in 2006. I introduced the cost per click model for Jobs in Europe. CPC is now a standard business model and a lot of the big Jobboards are using it or going to introduce it very soon! At this moment i am still a shareholder and adviser.

Together with my team in the Netherlands and Belgium i build the company to the following figures:

Facts & Figures +/- 300 publishers 150 million impressions a month 12 million visitors a month (network)

Currently shareholder at Aamigoo N.V is listed to the Euronext Amsterdam Stock Exchange:AMIGO

Revl is a website that helps people get their next job. It’s different from other job sites out there because it gives people a way to display every aspect of who they are, rather than just uploading their resume.

It’s for anyone who’s wanted a better way to say, “This is who I am. This is what I’ve done. And this is what I want to do.”

Show the world who you are and get hired for it.

Specialties Founder, CEO entrepreneur with expertise in online/offline/social media, growing start-ups, advising start-ups, viral marketing, seo and latest internet trends. Labor Market Communications and Employer Branding.

milestones.description: Spelletjeswereld.be is a online game portal. Already 1.000.000 games played and more than 1000 members.
CEO REVL.COM/ Shareholder AamigoO Group N.V.
